activate.SetAsPrimary: Beha {{1}} e le sa ka sehloohong {{2}}
activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Khetha polelo ea ho feta ho kena le eona.
Mantsoe a bonolo a nang le mantsoe a seng makae ao u tla hopola habonolo.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Khetha polelo e ntle ea ho feta ho sireletsa akhaonto ea hau. Bona litlhahiso tsa maikutlo a mang.
activate.IfYouFeel: Haeba u utloa hore ho hong ho fositse, u ka khona

authorize.TermsLabel:
Ke balile mme kea lumela
ho {{link}}
authorize.mustAgree: Pele, o tlameha ho lumellana le lipehelo.

notifications.title: Lumello
notifications.prompt: Na o batla ho nolofalletsa litlhahisoleseding? U tla fumana lisebelisoa tsa nako ea sebele ka lintho tseo u li hlokomelang.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Amoheloa! Ka kopo netefatsa aterese ea hau ea imeile.
notifications.WelcomeVerifyEmail: Amoheloa! Netefatsa aterese ea hau ea imeile.
notifications.ForgetPass: Hey, o kile oa lebala molaetsa oa hau?
notifications.PassphraseSaved: Polelo ea hau ea ho feta e bolokiloe.
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: U qetile ts'ebetso ea mosebelisi. Leka ho kena hona joale.

invalidLanguageSelected: Puo e sa nepahaleng e khethiloeng

login.title: Rea u amohela
login.directionsNoRegister: Kena haeba u na le ak'haonte.
login.passphrase: Kenya polelo ea hau ea ho feta:
login.resendConfirm: Na u batla ho romella molaetsa ho etsa poleloana ea hau ea 'nete?
login.resendSuccess: Lekola molaetsa hore o hlophisetse polelo ea hau ea mantsoe
login.noPassphrase: Pele o kena, o lokela ho ipehela poleloana ea ho feta ka ho tobetsa sehokelo molaetseng oa hau oa ts'ebetso.
login.notVerified: U tlameha ho it romella molaetsa oa ts'ebetso e le hore u kene.
login.emailExists: Na u kile oa leka ho ingolisa le lengolo-tsoibila lena pele? Haeba ho joalo, hlahloba hore na ke eng e kenyang ak'haonte ea hau. Tobetsa ho romella molaetsa hape
login.mobileExists: Na u kile oa leka ho ingolisa le nomoro ee ea mohala pele? Haeba ho joalo, hlahloba molaetsa oa hau oa tšebetsong. Tobetsa ho romella molaetsa hape

placeholders.email: kenya aterese ea hau ea lengolo tsoibila

login.facebookNoEmail: Ak'haonte ea hau ea facebook e haelloa ke aterese ea lengolo-tsoibila. Kenya feela tsela ea tlhaho.
login.picTooltip: U ka fetola setšoantšo sena hamorao

alert.title: E lebisitse ho Wallet
alert.content: Hang ha u koala lebokose lena, u tla isoa sepacheng sa hau. Kamora hore o kene, khutlela leqepheng lena.

facebook.noEmail: Ak'haonte ea hau ea facebook ha e na aterese ea lengolo-tsoibila e netefalitsoeng. Feela kena ka tsela ea tlhaho.

placeholders.identifier: kenya # kapa lengolo tsoibila la hau
placeholders.mobile: kenya nomoro ea hau ea mohala
placeholders.email: kenya aterese ea hau ea lengolo tsoibila

prompt.title: {{Platform}} Ak'haonte
prompt.noLongerUsing: Ha o sa kopantsoe le {{platform}} joalo ka
